address.docs:
**, int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x0C`.

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

drdy_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: Data-ready pin. Often labelled `INT`. Using this pin might lead to slightly quicker read times.

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

filter.docs:
**, int**: On-chip digital filter. Defaults to `6`. Must be between `0` and `7`.

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

gain.docs:
**, int**: Sets the analog gain. Defaults to `1X`. Must be one of
  * `1X`
  
  * `1_25X`
  
  * `1_67X`
  
  * `2X`
  
  * `2_5X`
  
  * `3X`
  
  * `3_75X`
  
  * `5X`
  
  

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

hallconf.docs:
**, int**: Modifies the hall plate spinning (2-phase vs 4-phase). Defaults to `0xC`. Must be `0xC` or `0x0`.

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

i2c_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [I²C Component](https://esphome.io/components/i2c.html#i2c) if you want to use multiple I²C buses.

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

oversampling.docs:
**, int**: On-chip oversampling. Defaults to `2`. Must be between `0` and `3`.

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
Built-in temperature sensor.
  * **oversampling** (*Optional*, int): On-chip oversampling for the temperature sensor. Defaults to `0`. Must be between `0` and `3`.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

oversampling.docs:
**, int**: On-chip oversampling for the temperature sensor. Defaults to `0`. Must be between `0` and `3`.

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature_compensation.docs:
**, bool**: On-chip temperature compensation. Defaults to `false`. When enabled, the resolution options `DIV_8` and `DIV_4` cannot be used.

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

x_axis.docs:
The information for the x-axis.
  * **resolution** (*Optional*, int): Specify which part of the full 19-bit value to read. Defaults to `DIV_4`. Must be one of:
    * `DIV_8`
    
    * `DIV_4`
    
    * `DIV_2`
    
    * `DIV_1`
    
    
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

resolution.docs:
**, int**: Specify which part of the full 19-bit value to read. Defaults to `DIV_4`. Must be one of:
  * `DIV_8`
  
  * `DIV_4`
  
  * `DIV_2`
  
  * `DIV_1`
  
  

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

y_axis.docs:
The information for the y-axis.
  * **resolution** (*Optional*, int): Specify which part of the full 19-bit value to read. Defaults to `DIV_4`. Must be one of:
    * `DIV_8`
    
    * `DIV_4`
    
    * `DIV_2`
    
    * `DIV_1`
    
    
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*

resolution.docs:
**, int**: Specify which part of the full 19-bit value to read. Defaults to `DIV_4`. Must be one of:

z_axis.docs:
The information for the z-axis.
  * **resolution** (*Optional*, int): Specify which part of the full 19-bit value to read. Defaults to `DIV_4`. Must be one of:
    * `DIV_8`
    
    * `DIV_4`
    
    * `DIV_2`
    
    * `DIV_1`
    
    
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [MLX90393 Triple-axis Magnetometer](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mlx90393.html#configuration-variables)*
